snippet: The St. Anthony Friars basketball team, under Coach Bob Hurley Sr., is attempting to win a 28th state title, despite the loss of its home court to flooding and the financial pressures on the Catholic school.
abstract: St Anthony High School basketball team, under Coach Bob Hurley Sr, is attempting to win a 28th New Jersey state title, despite the loss of its home court to flooding and financial pressures on the Catholic school.
lead_paragraph: The St. Anthony Friars basketball team, under Coach Bob Hurley Sr., is attempting to win a 28th state title, despite the loss of its home court to flooding and the financial pressures on the Catholic school.

headline.main: For St. Anthony, Lack of Home Court Is Least of Its Problems
headline.print_headline: For St. Anthony, Lack of Home Court Is Least of Its Problems
